sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .description
        .wrapper
            block-article
            block-video
            block-text
            expert-opinion
            block-text
            specifications(v-if="mobile")
            social-block
            screencastify
        aside.description__sidebar
            specifications(v-if="!mobile")
            card-app
</template>

<script>
    import blockArticle from '../includes/contentBlocks/article.vue';
    import blockVideo from '../includes/contentBlocks/blockVideo.vue';
    import blockText from '../includes/contentBlocks/blockText.vue';
    import ExpertOpinion from '../includes/contentBlocks/expertOpinion.vue';
    import Specifications from '../includes/card/specifications.vue';
    import CardApp from '../includes/card/card-app.vue';
    import SocialBlock from '../includes/smallBlocks/socialBlock.vue';
    import Screencastify from '../includes/card/screencastify.vue';


    export default {
        name: 'Description',
        data: function(){
            return {
                mobile: document.documentElement.clientWidth < 640 ? true : false
            }
        },
        components: {
            'block-article': blockArticle,
            'block-video': blockVideo,
            'block-text': blockText,
            'specifications': Specifications,
            'card-app': CardApp,
            'expert-opinion': ExpertOpinion,
            'social-block': SocialBlock,
            'screencastify': Screencastify
        },
        methods: {
            mobileDetector(){
                document.documentElement.clientWidth < 640 ? this.mobile = true : this.mobile = false;
            }
        },
        mounted(){
            window.addEventListener('resize', this.replaceIcon);
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .description {
        position: relative;
        padding-bottom: 97px;

        &__sidebar {
            position: absolute;
            top: 19px;
            right: 81px;

            & > * {
                &:not(:last-child) {
                    margin-bottom: 23px;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    .social-block {
        margin-top: -17px;
        margin-bottom: 70px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .description {
            &__sidebar {
                right: 30px;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .description {
            padding-bottom: 60px;

            &__sidebar {
                position: relative;
                top: auto;
                right: auto;
                padding: 0 30px;
                text-align: center;
                display: flex;
            }
        }

        .social-block {
            margin: 24px auto 40px auto;
            justify-content: center;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .description {
            padding-bottom: 46px;

            &__sidebar {
                padding: 0 20px;
            }
        }

        .card.card-app {
            width: 100%;
        }
    }
</style>
